turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order pizza from Dominos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How big of an order would this be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking about 5 pizza pies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Do you want me to place the order online right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, which pizzas do you want to get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think we are going to get 3 of the 7.99 deals.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's a cost effective way. Which ones.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We would like to get a large pepperoni, sausage and chicken pizza; a large olives, spinach and extra cheese pizza; and a large pineapple, ham and bacon pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, to repeat the order back to you, just to confirm that I got it correct, large pepperoni, sausage and chicken pizza; a large olives, spinach and extra cheese pizza; and a large pineapple, ham and bacon pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any sides? Wings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not this time, we have chips already.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. What about drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We are stocked with drinks as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I will put in this order. Delivery time is around 30 minutes. Same address for delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, the order is place online. They should arrive in 30 minutes. It is charged to the card already on the account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you for placing the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Have fun and enjoy!

items.name: olives, spinach and extra cheese pizza
Alright, the order is place online
